edu.wright.cs.jfiles.core

Class XmlHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wright.cs.jfiles.core.XmlHandler

  • public class XmlHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the FileStruct class in an ArrayList and provides methods to read and write to data streams.
    Author:
    brian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XmlHandler()
      Zero argument constructor.
      XmlHandler(java.lang.String path)
      Constructs an ArrayList of FileStruct objects.
      XmlHandler(java.lang.String path, java.io.OutputStreamWriter str)
      Constructs an ArrayList of FileStruct objects and sends it as XML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlHandler

        public XmlHandler()
        Zero argument constructor.

      • XmlHandler

        public XmlHandler(java.lang.String path)
        Constructs an ArrayList of FileStruct objects. If passed a path with a trailing slash in the path, list only the directory. Otherwise, list the contents of the directory.
        Parameters:
        path - path that you want to XMLify

      • XmlHandler

        public XmlHandler(java.lang.String path,
                  java.io.OutputStreamWriter str)
        Constructs an ArrayList of FileStruct objects and sends it as XML. If passed a path with a trailing slash in the path, list only the directory. Otherwise, list the contents of the directory.
        Parameters:
        path - that you want to XMLify
        str - stream to send XML to
